node.title: The sort of fiction you're most likely to find me reading:
node.author: Petruchio

data.field: The Taming of the Shrew The Lord of the Rings The Bhagavad Gita Foundation The Dark Knight Returns Steppenwolf Rime of the Ancient Mariner Firestarter Ulysses The Shadow Over Innsmouth War and Peace The Da Vinci Code Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix Gravity's Rainbow Bridget Jones' Diary The Colour of Magic Burnt Njal Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas Quo Vadis Murder on the Orient Express Flatland The Story of the Stone My tastes are too discriminating for these vulgar choices. Fiction? Ew! Reading is for sissies. My sister told me me the poll options.
